text: RFT may refer to: * Rational Functional Tester, IBM software * Regulatory focus theory, a psychological theory * Relational frame theory, a psychological theory * Remote field testing, a materials testing method with low-frequency AC * Request for tender, an invitation to product or service suppliers * Revisable-Form Text, part of IBM's Document Control Architecture (DCA) * The Riverfront Times, an alternative weekly newspaper in St. Louis, Missouri, US
title: RFT
